" chandra, ma obawa kadawuye itha rahasigatha wadakataya.eya sadew lowata adhipathi ma hata nusudusu wuwath ma sitha boho pida karawannaki.me langadi gauthiya muniwaraya samanga dew lowa siri narambaimata pamini ohuge rumath birida dutu ma hata aya kerehi sith wiya.age rupaya dewlowa diwyanganawange rupaya paradawayi.ayage sirure pahasa labena thuru mage chiththa pidawa manga noharenu atha.aa pathiwatha rakinniyak wimath age swamiya wana gauthiya muni balawath sruddhi labhiyeku wima ha ma siyallan garu buhuman karana balawath dewi keneku bawin eya kala yuththe itha rahasigathawa ayawa upakramashiraliwa rawatimen pamanaki.oba ma hata itha hithawath nisa meya obata pamanak pawasami.
